availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Farmer in Owsley County in 1850 and 1860. Private and corporal in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.).

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 303. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, Boonville, p. 33. National Park Service, Soldiers and Sailors Database, "Wilburn Bowman," https://www.nps.gov/civilwar/search-soldiers-detail.htm?soldierId=8D448D84-DC7A-DF11-BF36-B8AC6F5D9267. National Cemetery Administration, U.S. Veterans Gravesites, ca. 1775-2006, Ancestry, Kentucky, Booneville, Murrell Cemetery. KYR-0001-004-1337.
